author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Dharapuram police have registered a case against seven persons, including a revenue official and a person employed with Registration Department, for their alleged role in changing the name of a land holder in records through illegal means.

Police sources said the case was taken up on the direction of a judicial magistrate court in Dharapuram.

Velusamy, a resident of Dharapuram, noticed that two plots spread over an expanse of six acres, which was owned by his family, got registered under the name of another person in the record books. He suspected foul play and hence, approached the court for remedial measures.
title: Case registered
